    • 方法详细资料

      • balance

        public java.lang.Object balance(Context<?> respCtx,
                       Transaction targetTrans,
                       int balanceType,
                       java.lang.String operatorId,
                       boolean isTopup)
                         throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: BalanceService
        Maintain the balance of all supported balance types. At present there are following kinds of balance: sale, payout, cashout and commission.

        All balance will be maintained in the same style, will explain it by sale balance.

        There are several transactions may affect sale balance, for example sale, credit transfer and the corresponding cancellations. However there is a special case for sale transaction, if player pay by credit card, that says operator won't get the cash in pocket, money will be transferred from player's credit card account into lottery operator company's account directly, in this case no sale balance will be affected.

        Below illustrates the work flow of how sale(pay by cash) affects the sale balance.

        Sale Balance

        1. Check the credit type of operator.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple deduct the operator's sale balance and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchent.
        2. Check the credit type of parent merchant if needed.
          - credit type is DEFINITIVE VALUE
          1. Simple deduct the merchant's sale balance and return
          - credit type is USE PARENT
          1. Go to check the credit type of parent merchant until found a DEFINITIVE merchant.
        指定者:
        balance 在接口中 BalanceService
        参数:
        respCtx - The current transaction context.
        targetTrans - The target transaction. For a cancellation transaction, it should be the transaction that has been cancelled, however for normal transaction, it is itself.The following components must be set: totalAmont(it will be used to calculate balance and commission if needed)
        balanceType - Which balance will be operated? refer to BALANCE_TYPE.XXX.
        operatorId - Whose balance will be operated? Think about the 'credit transfer' transaction.
        isTopup - Topup or deduct the balance.
        返回:
        Whose balance has been updated? either operator or merchant(if credit type of operator is use-parent). null will be returned if no balance updated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • balance

        public java.lang.Object balance(Context<?> respCtx,
                       int balanceType,
                       java.lang.String operatorId,
                       boolean isTopup)
                         throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: BalanceService
        Maintain the balance of all supported balance types. This service will simply call BalanceService.balance(Context, Transaction, int, String, boolean) with targetTrans as respCtx.getTransaction().
        指定者:
        balance 在接口中 BalanceService
        参数:
        respCtx - The current transaction context.The following components must be set: transaction.totalAmont(it will be used to calculate commission if needed)
        balanceType - Which balance will be operated? refer to BALANCE_TYPE.XXX.
        operatorId - Whose balance will be operated? Think about the 'credit transfer' transaction.
        isTopup - Topup or deduct the balance.
        返回:
        Whose balance has been updated? either operator or merchant(if credit type of operator is use-parent). null will be returned if no balance updated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • lockAndVerifySaleBalance

        public java.lang.Object lockAndVerifySaleBalance(java.lang.String operatorId,
                                        long lefaMerchantId,
                                        java.math.BigDecimal transAmount)
                                          throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: BalanceService
        Lookup the operator/merchant node which will be responsible of balance maintenance. In generate it will be the operator, however if operator's credit type is 'use parent', this service will start to lookup its parent merchants(from leaf merchant till distributor), and return the first merchant whose credit type is 'definite value'.

        This interface will lock the operator/merchant node and compare the transAmount with current sale balance of operator/merchant node, if transAmount is less than current sale balance, exception SystemException.CODE_EXCEED_CREDITLIMIT will be thrown out.

        In some cases, null will be returned:

        • Configure the operator to ignore credit.
        • No 'definite value' merchant found, however from business point of view, this case should never happen.
        指定者:
        lockAndVerifySaleBalance 在接口中 BalanceService
        参数:
        operatorId - THe id of operator.
        lefaMerchantId - The id of leaf merchant of operator.
        transAmount - The amount of transaction.
        返回:
        a operator or merchant object. null will be returned if no need to care the balance.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounter any business exception.

      • registerBalanceStrategy

        public void registerBalanceStrategy(BalanceStrategy strategy)
        Register a TransactionBalanceStrategy for a given transaction type. For a given transaction type, only a single strategy implementation can be registered, however a strategy implementation can support multiple transaction types.

      • lookupBalanceStrategy

        public BalanceStrategy lookupBalanceStrategy(java.lang.Integer balanceType)
        Lookup a TransactionBalanceStrategy for a give transaction type, if no found a SystemException will be thrown out. null will be returned if no strategy implementation found.

      • doOperatorBalance

        protected final Operator doOperatorBalance(Context<?> respCtx,
                         Transaction targetTrans,
                         int balanceType,
                         Operator operator,
                         Merchant leafMerchant,
                         boolean isTopup)
                                    throws ApplicationException
        Maintain all supported type of balance of operator.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        targetTrans - The target transaction. To a cancellation, it is the transaction which has been cancelled, however to a normal transactions, such as sale, payout etc, it should be right current transaction.
        balanceType - Which balance should be maintained?
        operator - Whose balance should be maintained?
        leafMerchant - The leaf merchant of given operator.
        isTopup - topup or deduct the balance?
        返回:
        The operator whose balance has been maintained.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounters any business exception.

      • doMerchantBalance

        protected final Merchant doMerchantBalance(Context<?> respCtx,
                         Transaction targetTrans,
                         int balanceType,
                         Operator operator,
                         Merchant merchant,
                         boolean isTopup)
                                    throws ApplicationException
        Maintain all supported type of balance of merchant.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of current transaction.
        targetTrans - The target transaction. To a cancellation, it is the transaction which has been cancelled, however to a normal transactions, such as sale, payout etc, it should be right current transaction.
        balanceType - Which balance should be maintained?
        operator - Whose balance should be maintained?
        merchant - The leaf merchant of given operator.
        isTopup - topup or deduct the balance?
        返回:
        The operator whose balance has been maintained.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - if encounters any business exception.
